head.description: function-max-empty-lines Limit the number of adjacent empty lines within functions. The --fix option on the command line can automatically…

body:
#function-max-empty-lines

Limit the number of adjacent empty lines within functions.

a {
  transform:
    translate(
                /* ← */
      1,        /* ↑ */
                /* ← */
      1         /* ↑ */
                /* ← */
    );          /* ↑ */
}               /* ↑ */
/**                ↑
 *            These lines */

The --fix option on the command line can automatically fix all of the problems reported by this rule.

  • Options

#Options

int: Maximum number of characters allowed.

For example, with 0:

The following patterns are considered violations:

a {
  transform:
    translate(

      1,
      1
    );
}
a {
  transform:
    translate(
      1,

      1
    );
}
a {
  transform:
    translate(
      1,
      1

    );
}

The following patterns are not considered violations:

a {
  transform:
    translate(
      1,
      1
    );
}
